head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Albany: Nominees For Suny Board

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Albany: Nominees For Suny Board

body.head.byline: By KAREN W. ARENSON; Compiled by John Sullivan

block.p: Gov. Eliot Spitzer yesterday announced three nominees to fill coming vacancies on the State University of New York board. Besides Carl T. Hayden, whom Mr. Spitzer had identified as his choice as SUNY's chairman, the governor yesterday named H. Carl McCall, left, a former state comptroller and a former president of New York City's Board of Education, and Linda S. Sanford, a senior vice president at I.B.M. The governor appoints 15 of SUNY's 16 board members, subject to State Senate approval. The other seat is held by a student.

Gov. Eliot Spitzer yesterday announced three nominees to fill coming vacancies on the State University of New York board. Besides Carl T. The governor appoints 15 of SUNY's 16 board members, subject to State Senate approval. The other seat is held by a student.
